A refined sense of scale and proportion permeates the property inside and out.  The home features a gracious, flexible floor plan, inviting ambiance and abundant natural light. Enjoy the private patio and the large backyard while you add your unique history to those eminent people who lived here before.

The owner has done the heavy lifting by installing a new septic system and roof in the last few months.  Now you can bring your vision to update this adorable cottage with 8 windows in the knotty pine paneled living room. Miles of walking and hiking trails nearby, a walk to Verrill farm to pick up local fruits and vegetables. Concord schools are ranked in the top 5-6% in MA, and Willard Elementary school is around the corner. By far the least expensive single fam in Concord. If you love swimming, fishing, kayaking and great neighbors, the White Pond neighborhood, Concord's best kept secret, is the place for you! First open house Sunday Apr 26th 12:00-1:30.

SHOWINGINSTRUCTIONS: Call List Agent, Accompanied Showings, Appointment Required, Sign
REMARKS: Completely renovated Mid-Century Modern architectural gem. Designed by The Architect's Collaborative, the firm started by Walter Gropius, this is the only house designed by Gropius's firm in Concord, Massachusetts.  Quintessential Mid-Century Modern. The architecture is based on the design philosophy that Gropius and a group of architects, artists and thinkers developed while teaching at the Bauhaus in Weimar, Germany. The current owners purchased the property in 2008 and over a two year period, completely restored the house back to its original exterior, and added a second floor bedroom / studio above the existing two car garage.  The original blue prints were used to guide the restoration and fabrication of the architectural details. Internally, the house was completely rebuilt with new floors, walls, ceilings, plumbing and mechanical systems.  The siting and design of the house are life enhancing and create a visceral connection to the land and the property’s meandering stream.
